...and amazing producers that I've been able to work with.

...and just really cool, and inspiring people to be with.
It's so much fun because you never know what you're gonna get when you go into the studio,...
...which is like an experiment, a scientific project.
And you go in, and you know, you get on a vibe with a certain person.
And then, right when you think you're gonna get bored, you know, the song's done.

...and then, add such a cool flavor to the CD.

I really have grown attached to these songs.
